VALIDATION.EMAILISNOTVERIFIED: VERIFY YOUR EMAIL FIRST TO PERFORM THIS ACTION
VALIDATION.LINKTOKENINVALID: INVALID LINK OR LINK IS ALREADY EXPIRED
VALIDATION.PASSWORDSDONOTMATCH: PASSWORDS DO NOT MATCH. PLEASE ENSURE THAT BOTH FIELDS CONTAIN THE SAME PASSWORD
VALIDATION.ARRAYCANTBEEMPTY: {{FIELD}} SHOULD AT LEAST CONTAIN 1 VALUE IN ARRAY
VALIDATION.INVALIDIMAGEFILE: ONLY IMAGE FILE FORMAT IS SUPPORTED
VALIDATION.INVALIDAUDIOFORMAT: ONLY MP3 OR MPEG AUDIO FORMAT IS SUPPORTED
VALIDATION.MUSICRESOURCECANTBEBOTH: MUSIC FILE OR LINK CAN NOT BE SELECTED BOTH
VALIDATION.USERNOTALLOWEDSEENJOURNAL: USER {{USER}} DOES NOT ALLOW YOU TO SEE THEIR JOURNAL DATA. PLEASE CONTACT THIS USER TO ALLOW THEIR JOURNAL DATA SEEN BY YOU
VALIDATION.USERISNOTAPPROVED: YOUR ACCOUNT NEEDS TO BE APPROVED FIRST BEFORE CONTINUING THIS ACTION. PLEASE CONTACT ADMIN TO APPROVE YOUR ACCOUNT.

SUCCESSRESPONSE.CREATEUSER: USER SUCCESSFULLY CREATED. PLEASE CHECK YOUR EMAIL TO VERIFY IT

VERIFICATIONEMAIL.TITLE: VERIFY YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS!
VERIFICATIONEMAIL.CONTENT: THANK YOU FOR REGISTERING ON OUR PLATFORM! TO PROCEED, WE NEED TO VERIFY YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS. $t(EMAILRESPONSE.CLICKBUTTON, {"ACTION": "VERIFY YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS" }).

VERIFICATIONEMAILCHANGED.TITLE: VERIFY YOUR NEW EMAIL ADDRESS!
VERIFICATIONEMAILCHANGED.CONTENT: YOUR EMAIL HAS BEEN SUCCESSFULLY CHANGED. $t(EMAILRESPONSE.CLICKBUTTON, {"ACTION": "VERIFY YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS" }).

WAITINGFORAPPROVALEMAIL.TITLE: SUCCESSFULLY VERIFIED YOUR EMAIL
WAITINGFORAPPROVALEMAIL.CONTENT: CONGRATULATION YOUR EMAIL SUCCESSFULLY VERIFIED AND WAIT FOR OUR ADMIN TO APPROVE YOUR ACCOUNT AS PSYCHOLOG.
